titleStmt.title: Directions given by Anthony Daffey, for taking the safe, innocent, and successful cordial drink, called Elixir Salutis, truly prepared by me Ellen. Daffey now living in the square in Salisbury-Court, in the house that was formerly Dr. Brown's, near Fleetstreet, a large golden ball being over the gate.
titleStmt.author: Daffey, Ellen.
Daffy, Anthony.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing (CD-ROM edition).
Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2479 is uncut sheet.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
